name: Justice Heist
description:
Justice Heist is a futuristic bank robbery game in a dystopian universe where corruption has taken over and one man decides to take matters into his own hands by stealing the money back. The player has to get past guards, lasers, mini games and much more. It is packed with suspense, action, and requires players to act fast otherwise they can get caught. 

HOW TO PLAY 

  • Single player game 
  • WASD keys to move 
  • Shift to sprint
  • E to collect. 

Attributions

  • Music Credit: https://eoun.com/track/pursuit
  • Art Assets and backgrounds:  Sehrish Hoodbhoy and Vivien Shen
  • Game code: Zaid Baig and Jenny Nguyen
